metadata.title: USGS CMG F-2-86-BS - GLORIA
metadata.description:
Equipment Used GLORIA sidescan, two-channel airgun, transitsatellite 
oranc loran-c, gps, 10khz 10 khz echo-sounder, 3dot5khz 3.5 khz bathymetry, magnetics magnetometer, gravity
metadata.notes:

Status: Complete
